constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL SB1  South of the Borough

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with 3no front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The erection of a hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with 3no front rooflights to facilitate a loft conversion and alterations to the chimney falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B, C and G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Conditions 72 (Drainage Strategy) - The RBK Flood Risk Officer and Thames Water have reviewed the information provided and are satisfied this can now be approved. Thames Water would recommend that petrol / oil interceptors be fitted in all car parking/washing/repair facilities. Failure to enforce the effective use of petrol / oil interceptors could result in oil-polluted discharges entering local watercourses.

Please confirm the description ''External redecoration of front and side facades. Erection of external front columns and illuminated menu box extension. Relocation of non-illuminated signage plaque and replacement of existing awnings, signage and external lightings.''
